TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceProvider

summary.span: Defines the interface a class must implement to act as a resource provider.

span.span: Defines the interface a class must implement to act as a resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源提供程序帮助的资源文件中的值检索。A resource provider facilitates the retrieving of values from a resource file. 形式的表达式时`<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>`遇到分析过程中页，该资源提供程序返回资源的本地化的值。When an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>` is encountered during page parsing, the resource provider returns the localized value for the resource. 类创建的实例用于检索值的对象。The class creates instances of objects for use in retrieving the values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的实现的类实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a class that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现时，方法返回基于当前区域性的资源键的本地化的值。When implemented, the method returns the localized value for a resource key based on the current culture. 实现类无法检索属性的值如果`culture`参数不传递中。The implementing class could retrieve the property if a value for the `culture` parameter is not passed in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的自定义的资源提供程序实现的实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 资源提供程序包括自定义方法。The resource provider includes a customized method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceReader As IResourceReader
public: property System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ ResourceReader { System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an object to read resource values from a source.

span.span: Gets an object to read resource values from a source.

value.span: 与当前的资源提供程序关联。

span.span: The associated with the current resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象从源中读取顺序的名称/值对。An object reads sequential name/value pairs from a source. 和类提供默认分别接口从.resources 和.resx 文件进行读取的实现。The and classes provide default interface implementation for reading from .resources and .resx files, respectively. 其他实现接口无法从任何源读取包含资源的值。Other implementations of the interface could read from any source containing resource values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的自定义的资源提供程序实现的实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 资源提供程序包括自定义属性。The resource provider includes a customized property.
